## Events.BlockDrag class

Notifies listeners when a block is being manually dragged/dropped.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BlockDrag extends UiBase 
```
**Extends:** [UiBase](./blockly.events.uibase.md)

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(opt\_block, opt\_isStart, opt\_blocks)](./blockly.events.blockdrag._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BlockDrag</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [blockId?](./blockly.events.blockdrag.blockid.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The ID of the top-level block being dragged. |
|  [blocks?](./blockly.events.blockdrag.blocks.md) |  | [Block](./blockly.block.md)<!-- -->\[\] | _(Optional)_ A list of all of the blocks (i.e. all descendants of the block associated with the block ID) being dragged. |
|  [isStart?](./blockly.events.blockdrag.isstart.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ True if this is the start of a drag, false if this is the end of one. |
|  [type](./blockly.events.blockdrag.type.md) |  | EventType |  |
